00018 #include <stdlib.h>
00019 #include <votca/ctp/qmapplication.h>
00020 #include <votca/ctp/calculatorfactory.h>
00021 #include <string>
00022 
00023 using namespace votca::ctp;
00024 
00025 /*
00026  *
00027  */
00028 class QMAppRun : public QMApplication {
00029 public:
00030     void HelpText() {}
00031 
00032     string ProgramName() { return "ctp_run"; }
00033 
00034     void HelpText(std::ostream &out) {
00035         out << "Runs specified calculators." << endl;
00036     }
00037 
00038     void Initialize() {
00039         QMApplication::Initialize();
00040         AddProgramOptions("Calculators")
00041             ("execute,e", boost::program_options::value<string>(), "list of calculators separated by commas or spaces")
00042             ("list,l", "lists all available calculators")           
00043             ("description,d", boost::program_options::value<string>(), "detailed description of a calculator");
00044     }
00045 
00046     // outputs options from the XML file
00047     bool EvaluateOptions() {
00048         
00049         if(OptionsMap().count("list")) {
00050             cout << "Available calculators: \n";
00051             for(CalculatorFactory::assoc_map::const_iterator iter=Calculators().getObjects().begin();
00052                     iter != Calculators().getObjects().end(); ++iter) {
00053                 PrintDescription( (iter->first).c_str(), _short );
00054             }
00055             StopExecution();
00056             return true;
00057         }
00058 
00059 
00060          if(OptionsMap().count("description")) {
00061             CheckRequired("description", "no calculator is given");
00062             Tokenizer tok(OptionsMap()["description"].as<string>(), " ,\n\t");
00063             // loop over the names in the description string
00064             for (Tokenizer::iterator n = tok.begin(); n != tok.end(); ++n) {
00065                 // loop over calculators
00066                 bool printerror = true;
00067                 for(CalculatorFactory::assoc_map::const_iterator iter=Calculators().getObjects().begin(); 
00068                         iter != Calculators().getObjects().end(); ++iter) {
00069 
00070                     if ( (*n).compare( (iter->first).c_str() ) == 0 ) {
00071                          PrintDescription( (iter->first).c_str(), _long );
00072                         printerror = false;
00073                         break;
00074                     }
00075                  }
00076                  if ( printerror ) cout << "Calculator " << *n << " does not exist\n";
00077             }
00078             StopExecution();
00079             return true;
00080          }
00081 
00082         QMApplication::EvaluateOptions();
00083         CheckRequired("execute", "no calculator is given");
00084         
00085         Tokenizer tok(OptionsMap()["execute"].as<string>(), " ,\n\t");
00086         for (Tokenizer::iterator n = tok.begin(); n != tok.end(); ++n)
00087             AddCalculator(Calculators().Create((*n).c_str()));
00088         return true;
00089     }
00090 
00091     
00092     void PrintDescription(const char *name, const bool length) {
00093         // loading the documentation xml file from VOTCASHARE
00094         char *votca_share = getenv("VOTCASHARE");
00095         if(votca_share == NULL) throw std::runtime_error("VOTCASHARE not set, cannot open help files.");
00096         string xmlFile = string(getenv("VOTCASHARE")) + string("/ctp/xml/")+name+string(".xml");
00097         try {
00098             Property options;
00099             load_property_from_xml(options, xmlFile);
00100 
00101            if ( length ) { // short description of the calculator
00102                
00103                  cout << string("  ") << _fwstring(string(name),14);
00104                  cout << options.get(name+string(".description")).as<string>();
00105 
00106             } else { // long description of the calculator
00107                 cout << " " << _fwstring(string(name),18);
00108                 cout << options.get(name+string(".description")).as<string>() << endl;
00109  
00110                 list<Property *> items = options.Select(name+string(".item"));
00111 
00112                 for(list<Property*>::iterator iter = items.begin(); iter!=items.end(); ++iter) {
00113                     //cout << "Long description" << endl;
00114                     Property *pname=&( (*iter)->get( string("name") ) );
00115                     Property *pdesc=&( (*iter)->get( string("description") ) );
00116                     //Property *pdflt=&( (*iter)->get( string("default") ) );
00117                     if ( ! (pname->value()).empty() ) {
00118                         cout << string("  -") << _fwstring(pname->value(), 14);
00119                         cout << pdesc->value() << endl;
00120                     }
00121                  }
00122             }
00123             cout << endl;
00124         } catch(std::exception &error) {
00125             cout << string("XML file or description tag missing: ") << xmlFile;
00126         }
00127     }
00128 
00129 private:
00130     static const bool _short = true;
00131     static const bool _long = false;
00132 
00133     string _fwstring(string original, size_t charCount ) {
00134         original.resize( charCount, ' ' );
00135         return original;
00136     }
00137 
00138     
00139 };
00140 
00141 int main(int argc, char** argv) {
00142     QMAppRun qmapprun;
00143     return qmapprun.Exec(argc, argv);
00144 }
